alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 22 at 6:32PM EDT until June 22 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 402 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL OHIO MONROE NOBLE IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA FAYETTE GREENE WASHINGTON WESTMORELAND IN WEST CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA INDIANA IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST WEST VIRGINIA PRESTON TUCKER IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA MARION MONONGALIA WETZEL IN THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA MARSHALL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF CALDWELL, CANONSBURG, CONNELLSVILLE, DAVIS, FAIRMONT, GREENSBURG, INDIANA, KINGWOOD, LATROBE, MASONTOWN, MORGANTOWN, MOUNDSVILLE, MURRYSVILLE, NEW KENSINGTON, NEW MARTINSVILLE, PARSONS, TERRA ALTA, THOMAS, UNIONTOWN, WASHINGTON, WAYNESBURG, AND WOODSFIELD.
